actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill relating to toll-refining agreements.

summary.text: Qualifies petroleum products for a general license for reexport when such products are refined in the United States from foreign crude oil pursuant to a processing agreement. Prohibits such qualification for national security or foreign policy reasons certified by the President.

titles.title: A bill relating to toll-refining agreements.
